group_1.narration: They gathered at the diner again...

group_1.textRight: All right, let's order first!

group_1.textLeft: Kako, whaddaya want?

group_1.textRight: Umm... Oh, I know. I'll get the matcha@ice cream!

group_1.textLeft: I want rice gratin! The rice gratin!

group_1.textRight: You'll be too full for dinner. Get something@small like ice cream.

group_1.textLeft: But...! [chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]Okay, vanilla ice cream!

group_1.textRight: I'll have a coffee.

group_1.textLeft: Milk tea for me. Iced, please.

group_1.textRight: Hot oolong tea.
I noticed it last time, but what exactly is@that "self-service drink bar"?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, do you really not know, Nanaka?

group_1.textRight: No.
Our last meeting here was the first time@I had ever stepped foot in a diner.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No way! Wow...
You're ignorant about the weirdest things.

group_1.textRight: Am I...?

group_1.textLeft: I'll explain. See over there? That spot that@has all the drinks lined up?

group_1.textRight: The place with all the glasses?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that one! [chara:300801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300801:cheek_0][chara:300801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300801:lipSynch_1]That's the "drink bar".
You pay a set price, and then you can drink@any of those drinks and get free refills.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh...! So you can drink as much as you like?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's a self-service drink bar!

group_1.textRight: Well, I guess I have no choice...@I will try my hand at this "drink bar"!

group_1.textLeft: Okay! Now that we've explained that...
Let's continue where we left off.

group_1.textRight: All right, then I'll say it one more time.
"First come, first served" is best.
Meiyui...

group_1.textLeft: So you haven't changed your mind.

group_1.textRight: I won't change it.

group_1.textLeft: All right... Anyone else?
Rock, paper, scissors! We're not finished@yet!

group_1.textRight: Ayame, that's not really the point here...

group_1.textLeft: Then what IS the point?

group_1.textRight: It's not like we're trying to figure out@who's best at rock, paper, scissors...

group_1.textLeft: We aren't?!

group_1.textRight: No... We're deciding what to do if we end@up fighting over the same Witch.

group_1.textLeft: But, but, but...! The answer is still rock,@paper, scissors!
Ahh...
Well, then, how's this?

group_1.textRight: How is what?

group_1.textLeft: Two different groups meet up in front of@the same Witch...
And then...
